document.full_text: fresh from becoming asia's first winner of golf's unofficial "fifth major" at the players championship last week, k.j. choi has announced he will host his own tournament in his home country of south korea later this year.
document.title: asian trailblazer choi to host own tournament
lines_and_colors: fresh from becoming asia's first winner of golf's unofficial "fifth major" at the players championship last week, k.j. choi has announced he will host his own tournament in his home country of south korea later this year.
